history.text: Hello
The movie is Titled " Despicable Me"
Hey how are you doing today?
Interesting, I haven't heard about it before.
I'm good thank you.. and you sir? hope you're fine and having a great day
Having a great day so far just looking for a movie to watch.
Did you watched this movie?
I have not yet, who stars in it?
It was directed by Pierre Coffin
How did it score in the reviews?
It is an animation movie staring by Steve Carrel as Gru
I do enjoy animation movies, especially those that are funny, what goes on it the movie?
Jason Seggel as Victor and Russel Brand as Dr Nefario
It has a Rating by Rotten Tomatoes of 81% an average of 6.8 /100
Those are great ratings.
OHH REALLY YOU ENJOY ANIMATION MOVIES , ME NOT QUIT BUT IT IS OK..
yeah..
I did not watched the movie also thats why I'm just reading the description  ahaha
So sorry for the delay of the anwers though
Oh I see, well I mean it sounds interesting to me, no problem. I wonder if it's a drama or a comedy
Its a litle of an action because in the story sombody was stolen something from the character and to his minions..
ahaha.. now I know this movie was also characters by the minions
the minions was good so i could totally see myself checking this one out.
I think this is the movie that Minions where well known
Makes sense to me, when did it come out?
Yeah I think I going to watched this movie also
ohh wait I'll just read when
It was released july 9 of 2010
IT was a dubut film of Illumination Entertainment
Oh true so I could just rent it, anything else interesting about the movie you want to share?
It has a kidnaping scenes that eventually minons help Gru to save them.
well that what I read agaha..
Well I have to watched this movie to understand the story at all.. ahaha sorry,.
It's okay, just curious, it sounds good anyway.

Gru, a supervillain, is disheartened when an unknown supervillain steals the Great Pyramid
of Giza. Gru, with the assistance of his colleague Dr. Nefario and his Minions, resolves to
one-up this mystery rival by shrinking and stealing the Moon. As it would be costly to steal
the moon, Gru seeks a loan from the Bank of Evil. Bank president Mr. Perkins is impressed
by the plan but will provide the money only if Gru can obtain the necessary shrink ray first.
Upon learning that an up-and-coming villain named Vector was responsible for the pyramid
theft, Gru starts a rivalry with him.
The rivalry sounds fun to me
yeah ahaha.. there that's I think the simple summary of some scene
I think there is already a part 2 of this movie
Is there? It'd be fun to watch them both in a row possibly.
yeah if there's really a part 2 already it is more fun to watched it will be a movie marathon to be.. Ahaha

uid1response.feedback: The user didn't go a great job describing the movie to me but I did my best.

uid2response.feedback: The conversation become smooth the user 2 was very acommodating just answering all the question, as for this movie I think I will watched this movie..
